There's a reason this season can't come soon enough,...
...why 35 million people are now cheering for the north,...
...and free throws are never a given.
Why Philly is becoming known for skyscrapers,...
...why NBA history is always being rewritten,...
...why sometimes a jacket means more than a jersey,...
...and why this game is about more than just basketball.
There's a reason this fall is gonna be hotter than the summer.
Why two seconds can feel like an eternity,...
...and why any city can become the center of the universe.
